name: Shadow Light
description:
To be an expert in ancient art of stealth, one must learn the basics. Cast shadow and manipulate light to reach your goal. Nothing can stop you from becoming the very best.

~~~~~~

This is an entry for the MiniJam 55 with the theme of stealth. Due to the limited time frame, I was not able to fix some bugs and add more levels and mechanics. Hopefully I can update this in the future. Hope you guys enjoy! :D
